WorkItem.Description: i am using Excel 2007(.xlsx) and converting data to dataset using "Excel.ExcelReaderFactory.CreateOpenXmlReader(stream)" and "excelReader.AsDataSet()" which returns me Dataset but  the  decimal values from Excel sheet say 0.07 0r 0.02  are converted to Exponential values in Dataset(7.000e-2). Please provide me a solution.
WorkItem.Summary: Dataset Showing decimals as Exponential values

Comments.Message: Not sure if this will help you If you apply patch in Issue Id #8536 to preserve datatypes, the result will be a double and not a string (or an object with the correct type if cells in column have inconsistent types).
